title: The One With The Worst Best Man Ever

questions.question: What does Phoebe say is the only happiness she gets from, which has to be decaf due to her pregnancy?
options: A cup of tea
A cup of coffee
A glass of wine
A piece of cake
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'The only happiness I get is from a cup of coffee, which of course is decaf, ‘cause—Oh! I’m pregnant!'

questions.question: Why does Joey think he should be Ross's best man?
options: Because he's known Ross longer
Because he's never been a best man before
Because Ross was his best man at his wedding
Because Chandler is already the best man
questions.correct_answer: Because he's never been a best man before
questions.explanation: Joey says 'I don’t have any brothers; I’ll never get to be a best man!'

questions.question: What is the reason Monica and Rachel give for not inviting Joey to Phoebe's baby shower?
options: Because Joey is not a bachelor
Because Joey is not a stripper
Because Joey is planning a party for Ross
Because Joey doesn't like babies
questions.correct_answer: Because Joey is not a bachelor and not a stripper, but the actual reason given is that it's a baby shower and Joey doesn't fit the context
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'Are you bachelors?... Are you strippers?' to which Monica and Rachel both say 'Nooo!'

questions.question: What does Ross specifically tell Joey not to have at the bachelor party?
options: A lot of liquor
Many museum geeks
Any strippers
Any music
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Just a couple of guys hanging out playing poker, no-no strippers or anything okay?'

questions.question: What does Joey discover is missing after waking up the morning after the bachelor party?
options: The stripper
The ring
The liquor
The music

questions.question: What does Phoebe receive as a gift at her baby shower that she finds unhelpful?
options: A little leather jacket for the babies
A cup of decaf coffee
Leather pants for herself
A baby book
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'What the hell is this?! What, did you actually thought it would make me feel better to give me stuff that I can’t use for another two months?!'

questions.question: Why does Phoebe think she had a false labor?
options: Because she was stressed
Because she was scared
Because the babies were kicking each other
Because the book said it could happen near the end of pregnancy
questions.correct_answer: Because the book said it could happen near the end of pregnancy
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'They said that, that can happen near the end, just somebody get the book.'

questions.question: What is the plan to retrieve Ross's ring?
options: Call the police
Call the company that sent the stripper
Wait for the stripper to return it
Take the duck to the vet to remove the ring
questions.correct_answer: Take the duck to the vet to remove the ring
questions.explanation: The guys realize the duck might have swallowed the ring and decide to take it to the vet.

questions.question: What does Rachel suggest is a benefit of Phoebe not keeping the babies?
options: She won't have to change diapers
She won't have to save for college
She won't have to worry about the babies' health
She won't have to decide what to name them
questions.correct_answer: She won't have to save for college
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'you’re not gonna be the one worrying about saving for college...'

questions.question: What does Phoebe finally feel comfortable being called?
options: Mom
Aunt Phoebe
Cool Aunt Phoebe
Phoebe the pregnancy expert
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'I am pretty cool!... Cool Aunt Phoebe!'

questions.question: What procedure does the vet need to perform on the duck to retrieve Ross's ring?
options: A simple surgery
A complex operation
A ring removal
A duck examination
questions.explanation: The vet says it's a simple procedure to remove the ring from the duck.

questions.question: What is Joey's concern when the vet is about to perform the procedure on the duck?
options: That the vet won't be able to remove the ring
That the procedure will be too expensive
That something might go wrong during the procedure
That the duck will be unhappy
questions.correct_answer: That something might go wrong during the procedure
questions.explanation: Joey says 'If anything should happen to him… Things can go wrong!'

questions.question: Why does Ross call the company that sent the stripper?
options: To thank them for the stripper
To complain about the stripper's performance
To ask for the stripper's real name and number
To cancel the stripper's service
questions.correct_answer: To ask for the stripper's real name and number
questions.explanation: Ross says 'We’ll call the company that sent her!' to try to retrieve his stolen ring.

questions.question: What does Chandler jokingly suggest after the stripper denies stealing the ring?
options: That they should call the police
That they should search the apartment again
That he wants to marry the stripper
That they should give up looking for the ring
questions.correct_answer: That he wants to marry the stripper
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Marry me.' after the stripper denies stealing the ring, which Ross and Joey find amusing.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe have a change of heart about her pregnancy and the upcoming birth of the babies?
options: Because her friends threw her a baby shower
Because she realized she will be a cool aunt
Because she felt the babies kicking
Because she had a false labor
questions.correct_answer: Because she realized she will be a cool aunt
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'I am pretty cool!... Cool Aunt Phoebe!' after her friends reassure her about her role as an aunt.

questions.question: What is Monica's initial reaction when Phoebe has a contraction during the tea-drinking scene?
options: She stays calm and tries to help Phoebe
She panics and starts boiling water
She tries to give Phoebe the Bible to read
She quickly takes a step back
questions.correct_answer: She quickly takes a step back
questions.explanation: Monica and Rachel both take a step back when Phoebe grabs her stomach in pain.

questions.question: What does Ross say about the ring that was stolen?
options: It's been in his family for years
It's very expensive
It's a magic ring
It's worthless
questions.correct_answer: It's been in his family for years
questions.explanation: Ross says 'That ring? When my grandmother first came to this country, that ring and the clothes on her back were all she had with her.'

questions.question: Why does Joey sleep with the stripper after the bachelor party?
options: Because Ross told him to
Because Chandler encouraged him to
Because he wanted to have fun
Because the stripper asked him to
questions.correct_answer: Because he wanted to have fun
questions.explanation: Joey says 'Of course!!' when Chandler asks if he slept with the stripper, implying that he wanted to have fun.

questions.question: What is the final plan to retrieve Ross's stolen ring?
options: To call the police and report the theft
To search the apartment and question the stripper
To take the duck to the vet and remove the ring
To give up and buy a new ring
questions.correct_answer: To take the duck to the vet and remove the ring
questions.explanation: The guys realize the duck swallowed the ring and decide to take it to the vet to retrieve the ring.
